sentences.english: The traditional approach is done through an incision in the abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 传统的手术方式是在腹壁上开切口。

sentences.english: When a ventral hernia occurs, it usually arises in the abdominal wall where a previous surgical incision was made.
sentences.chinese: 腹疝一般发生在曾经做过手术的腹壁切口周围。

sentences.english: Objective To describe the features of endometriosis to abdominal wall scar on ultrasonography.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹壁瘢痕子宫内膜异位症的声像图特征。

sentences.english: We have a great list with thousands assortments of abdominoplasty .
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个伟大的腹壁品种数千册。

sentences.english: The abdominal wall was incised layer by layer.
Traditionally, the appendix is removed through an incision in the right lower abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 传统上，切除阑尾是在病人的右下腹壁切口进行。

sentences.english: The transversus abdominis plane (TAP) block is a peripheral nerve block which anaesthetises the abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 腹横肌平面阻滞是一种会痲痹腹壁的周边神经阻滞。

sentences.english: The tummy tuck is also technically known as an abdominoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 小卖店的肚子也是技术上称为腹壁。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of prolene mesh in treating incisional hernia.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结应用聚丙烯网片修补腹壁切口疝的体会。

sentences.english: Other sites that ventral hernias can develop are the belly button (umbilicus) or any other area of the abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 腹疝也可以发生在肚脐的周围或腹壁的任何地方。

sentences.english: An instrument called a trocar makes a puncture in the abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 一种叫做套管针的工具在腹壁上刺了一个孔。

sentences.english: Therefore post-natal woman abdominal wall obvious relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 所以产后妇女腹壁明显松弛。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical experiences of patch repair on giant abdominal incisional hernia.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结补片修补巨大腹壁切口疝的临床经验。

sentences.english: In this area the abdominal muscles have weakened; this results in a bulge or a tear.
sentences.chinese: 这部分腹壁的肌肉力量变弱，会造成隆起或者撕裂。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis, treatment and prevention of endometriosis in abdominal scars.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹壁切口子宫内膜异位症的诊治及预防。

sentences.english: Conclusion Patch repair is an ideal surgical procedure for giant abdominal incisional hernia.
sentences.chinese: 结论补片修补术是治疗巨大腹壁切口疝的理想方法。

definition: rectus abdominis muscle (aka abdominals or abs)
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
